title: San Juan Island National Historical Park: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture                   The First Ones               San Juan Island NHP Historic Resource Study               Civil War Connections               Learn about the Royal Marines with our free...               San Juan Island NHP Environmental History               American Camp was sometimes fun and games.         Â   The San Juan Boundary Dispute was the end result of more than three centuries of contention by western European powers over the land and resources of the Pacific Northwest.  But even before the first sails appeared on the horizon, the Northern Straits region was home to a thriving culture that had been here for thousands of years.  All were attracted by the temperate climate, rich soil, abundant timber and the bounty of the sea.
